data.text: Thank you,Honourable @FilomenaTassi Minister of Public Services,& Procurement,Canada, for the recognition of our humanitarian charter cargo flights delivering medical supplies. Ethiopian has transported 67,500+ tons of medical supplies &150 mil. doses of vacines to 30+countries. https://t.co/ZOQOpkjLrJ

urls.title: Ethiopian App
urls.description: You aren' t registered yet? Join the program for free and start enjoying the benefits for flights made 90 days back. You can now make your booking to more than 110 Ethiopian destination and mark your journey with the latest fleet using Ethiopian App by following simple steps. Experience premium app. You can now search and make your booking to more than 110 Ethiopian destinations and mark your journey with the latest fle ets using Ethiopian mobile App. Book your flight using your device and enjoy with us.

data.text: RT @business: Carrying goods during the past two years have helped many airlines stay afloat as border closures hammered demand for air tra…

urls.title: Welcome to Ethiopian Airlines Official Website

data.text:
We've learned that fake messages are circulating on social media claiming that @flyethiopian is offering gifts regarding its 75th anniversary. Please be wary of such scams. Here's our official website link: https://t.co/p3cupVXP0G

#EthiopianAirlines
Airplane mode on and ready for take-off! #FlyEthiopian https://t.co/rvwIdZ0QWi

It was a great honour for Ethiopian Airlines  to welcome Dr. Setor Norgbe, 1st Runner-Up Ghana’s Most Beautiful 2021 pageant. Dr. Setor received a warm welcome at Ethiopian Airlines and visited Ethiopian state-of-the-art facilities. #EthiopianAirlines https://t.co/e1vKzXGB7y
Let the adventure begin with Ethiopian. #FlyEthiopian https://t.co/EOKTULm1EV

Sit back, relax and feel refreshed on-board Ethiopian.
#FlyEhiopian https://t.co/NTKkLXfYvG
